intro:
Introducing Spot The Difference: Food and Drink, from the original creators of the globally famous Spot The Difference arcade game. Now featuring an exciting new twist: a dynamic two-player mode that lets you compete head-to-head with anyone, anywhere.

Dive into a thrilling culinary adventure with this fresh edition of Spot The Difference. Building on the engaging gameplay of the classic version, this installment challenges your sharp eye and quick thinking to identify differences faster than your opponent. Whether you’re competing against a friend or racing the clock in single-player mode, get ready for a captivating experience that will push your observation skills to the max.
